name: Overall
statement: The overall score is derived from the cummulative average of percent of positive responses to all statement/questions in the Viewpoint Survey.

children.name: Employee Engagement Index
children.statement: Score derived from cummulative average of all statements in this section.

children.name: Leaders Lead
children.statement: Supervisors work well with employees of different backgrounds.

children.name: Supervisors
children.statement: Managers communicate the goals and priorities of the organization.

children.name: Intrinsic Work Experience
children.statement: Managers review and evaluate the organization's progress toward meeting its goals and objectives.

children.name: Global Satisfaction Index
children.statement: Score derived from cummulative average of all statements in this section.

children.name: Positive Work Environment
children.statement: I recommend my organization as a good place to work.

children.name: Work
children.statement: Considering everything, how satisfied are you with your job?

children.name: Pay
children.statement: Considering everything, how satisfied are you with your pay?

children.name: Organization
children.statement: Considering everything, how satisfied are you with your organization?

children.name: New IQ Index
children.statement: Score derived from cummulative average of all statements in this section.
